original_text: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.
korean_text: 그의 형제 잇사갈의 모든 종족은 다 용감한 장사라 그 전체를 계수하면 팔만 칠천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar
sentences.korean_translation: 이사갈 모든 가족 중 그들의 형제들은

sentences.original_text: reckoned in all by their genealogies
